Topic.Title: The Eye Of The Storm Back Online.

Posts.EditableText:
Hey All!

Thank you for being patient though a hard time.

In Memory of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monty_Oum:3s13d5jq]Monty Oum[/url:3s13d5jq] I am putting my Gamebook back online although the updates to this gamebook is not complete but there is added content to it, one of these contents is Extreme Mode.

When the updates become available you will be told on this forum:[url=http://forum.textadventures.co.uk/viewforum.php?f=5:3s13d5jq]here[/url:3s13d5jq].

If you are from the [url=http://roosterteeth.com/home.php:3s13d5jq]Rooster Teeth Community[/url:3s13d5jq] You will also find the information about the updates [url=http://roosterteeth.com/groups/profile.php?id=18837:3s13d5jq]here[/url:3s13d5jq] or on [url=http://roosterteeth.com/660677:3s13d5jq]my Profile[/url:3s13d5jq]. I will also post some notices on one of the [url=http://roosterteeth.com/chat/RWBY:3s13d5jq]chat rooms[/url:3s13d5jq] on the Rooster Teeth website.

Here is the link to the [u:3s13d5jq][url=http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/9284kr2aw02uy5m4jtijcw/the-eye-of-the-storm:3s13d5jq]Gamebook[/url:3s13d5jq][/u:3s13d5jq].

Thank you and Enjoy.
